MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley, affecting properties in Bunbury and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required following third party damage to the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.40PM on 18th March 2021.
